entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carlyle

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
